plot: Pete has recently got a new job as a vacuum cleaner salesman. His mentor is the veteran Tommy, whose methods are rather rude; his sole target is to be the best salesman in his team and to receive the &"Golden Hoover&". Their temperaments are quite different and the apprentice days turn wilder and wilder.   Written by  Moritz Muehlenhoff
title: Vacuuming Completely Nude in Paradise
